      • copyIntoWorkspace

        public static org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile copyIntoWorkspace(File fileToCopy,
                                                                 org.eclipse.core.runtime.IPath destinationPath,
                                                                 String newFileName)
                                                          throws CredibilityException,
                                                                 IOException,
                                                                 org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
        Copy a file into the eclipse workspace
        Parameters:
        fileToCopy - the file to copy
        destinationPath - the destination path
        newFileName - the new file name
        Returns:
        the file copied in the workspace.
        Throws:
        CredibilityException - if a parameter is not valid.
        IOException - if an error occured during file writing.
        org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - if a runtime error occured.
